data.title: Prof. Dr. Phungmayo Horam
data.meta_description: Prof. Dr. Phungmayo Horam (Faculty and Team) - Gisma University of Applied Sciences. GISMA offers Bachelors and Masters Degree courses in Germany with a focus on helping students become exceptional leaders in their own professions.
data.text:
Life and Career

Prof. Dr. Phungmayo Horam is a resource economist, and his work focuses on the application of economics and management science for providing solutions for sustainable business practice and innovation. He completed his PhD at Humboldt University Berlin and has several years of experience in designing sustainable cities for the Future-Megacities project sponsored by BMBF and advisory work for technology and knowledge transfers in India, Germany and the UK.

He takes great pleasure in working with students and sharing his experience to develop independent and innovative thinking. In his free time, he enjoys playing badminton, cycling and facilitating discussions on a sustainable future through various formal and informal forums.
